1035.name: Emberknife
1035.description:
7% Omnivamp against jungle monsters
  • Sear: Damaging jungle monsters burns them for magic damage over 5 seconds.
  • Challenging Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item and upgrades your Smite to Challenging Smite, increasing its damage to monsters to 900 and damage to minions to 500 +10% target max Health. Challenging Smite marks champions for 4 seconds. Damaging a marked champion deals an additional true damage to them over 2.5 seconds. You take 10% reduced damage from marked champions.
  • Huntsman: Killing large jungle monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen up to Mana (based on missing mana) per second when in the jungle or river.

    Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.
    Only attacks and abilities apply Challenging Smite's burn

1039.name: Hailblade
1039.description:
7% Omnivamp against jungle monsters
  • Sear: Damaging jungle monsters burns them for magic damage over 5 seconds.
  • Chilling Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item and upgrades your Smite to Chilling Smite, increasing its damage to monsters to 900 and damage to minions to 500 +10% target max Health. Chilling Smite deals true damage to champions and steals 20% of their Move Speed for 2 seconds.
  • Huntsman: Killing large jungle monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen up to Mana (based on missing mana) per second when in the jungle or river.

    Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.

1040.name: Obsidian Edge
1040.description:
8% Omnivamp against jungle monsters
  • Sear: Damaging jungle monsters burns them for magic damage over 5 seconds.
  • Auto Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item and upgrades your Attack-Smite, increasing its damage to monsters to 900.
  • Huntsman: Killing large jungle monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen up to Mana (based on missing mana) per second when in the jungle or river.

    Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.

1043.name: Recurve Bow
1043.description: Sting: Basic attacks deal {{as|15 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]].

1054.name: Doran's Shield
1054.description:
Enduring Focus: After taking damage from a [[champion]], gain '''bonus''' [[health regeneration]] per second equal to {{pp|0 to 5.625 for 11|round=3|type='''missing''' health|color=health|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=0.375 bonus health regeneration for every 1% missing health}} for 8 seconds. Reduced to{{ft|66% effectiveness|{{pp|0*0.66 to 5.625*0.66 for 11|round=4|type='''missing''' health|color=health|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=0.2475 bonus health regeneration for every 1% missing health}}}}if owned by {{tip|ranged}} champions or when triggered by [[area of effect]], [[damage over time]], or [[damage|proc]].
Helping Hand: Basic attacks deal {{as|5 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] against [[minions]].

1056.name: Doran's Ring
1056.description:
Restoration: Restore {{as|{{fd|1.25}} mana}} every second. If you cannot gain mana, {{tip|healing|heal}} {{as|{{fd|0.55}} health}} instead.
Helping Hand: Basic attacks deal {{as|5 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] against [[minions]].

1082.name: Dark Seal
1082.description: Glory: Gain 2 stacks for each champion [[kill]] and 1 stack for each [[assist]], up to a '''maximum''' of 10 stacks. For every stack, gain {{as|4 ability power}}, up to {{as|40|AP}} at '''maximum''' stacks. Lose 5 stacks on [[death]]. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to {{ii|Mejai's Soulstealer}}.

1083.name: Cull
1083.description: Reap: Killing a [[minion]] grants an additional {{g|1}}, up to a '''maximum''' of {{g|100}}.

1101.name: Scorchclaw Pup
1101.description:
Jungle Companions: Summon a ''Scorchclaw Pup'' companion to assist you in combat against monsters.
Scorchclaw's Slash: Feed your companion enough treats to evolve it and upgrade your {{si|Smite}}. Upon the companion reaching its final evolution, this item is consumed, granting you the {{bi|Scorchclaw's Slash}} buff.

1102.name: Gustwalker Hatchling
1102.description:
Jungle Companions: Summon a ''Gustwalker Hatchling'' companion to assist you in combat against monsters.
Gustwalker's Gait: Feed your companion enough treats to evolve it and upgrade your {{si|Smite}}. Upon the companion reaching its final evolution, this item is consumed, granting you the {{bi|Gustwalker's Gait}} buff.

1103.name: Mosstomper Seedling
1103.description:
Jungle Companions: Summon a ''Mosstomper Seedling'' companion to assist you in combat against monsters.
Mosstomper's Courage: Feed your companion enough treats to evolve it and upgrade your {{si|Smite}}. Upon the companion reaching its final evolution, this item is consumed, granting you the {{bi|Mosstomper's Courage}} buff.

1104.name: Eye of the Herald
1104.description: Active - Consume: Crush the Eye of the Herald, begining the ritual to summon Rift Herald. You may click the Rift Herald after it has summoned to control how it charges. This control effect can be done once when it is summoned, and once each time a nearby enemy structure dies.

1105.name: Mosstomper Seedling
1105.description:
Jungle Companions
Summon a Jungle Pet that assists you against monsters.

Mosstomper's Courage
The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your Smite. When fully grown, it completes your Jungle Quest.

1106.name: Gustwalker Hatchling
1106.description:
Jungle Companions
Summon a Gustwalker that assists you against monsters.

Gustwalker's Gait
The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your Smite. When fully grown, it grants Move Speed upon entering brush, increased when killing large monsters.

1107.name: Scorchclaw Pup
1107.description:
Jungle Companions
Summon a Scorchclaw that assists you against monsters.

Scorchclaw's Slash
The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your Smite. When fully grown, it periodically imbues your next Attack or Ability to burn enemies and Slow them. Killing large monsters readies this immediately.

1111.name: Jarvan I's
1111.description:
25% Attack Speed
100 Move Speed
10 Ability Haste
12 Magic Penetration
25 Armor
20 Magic Resist
30% Tenacity

Jarvan One
Give you stats and passives from all boots.

Requires Augment: Quest: SneakerHead

1500.name: Ohmwrecker (Turret Item)
1500.description:
Dodge Piercing: Turret attacks cannot be dodged.
Warming Up: Turrets gain a stack for 5 seconds each time they strike a champion. Each stack increases their damage dealt by 50%, up to 150%.

1502.name: Reinforced Armor (Turret Item)
1502.description: : While no enemy {{tip|minions}} or {{ui|Rift Herald|Rift Herald Mercenary}} are within range, gain 80% damage reduction, including against {{as|true damage}}.

1503.name: Warden's Eye
1503.description: True Sight: Can see {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}} and {{tip|invisible}} units within 1100 units.

1505.name: Reinforced Armor
1505.description:
Reinforced
Turrets take 80% reduced damage, including True Damage, when no enemy Lane Minions or Rift Herald are nearby.

Melee Weakness
Turrets take 20% increased damage from melee Champions.

Regeneration
Inhibitor turrets have health regeneration but cannot regenerate past their current segment at 30%, 75%, and 100% health.

1506.name: Base Turret Reinforced Armor (Turret Item)
1506.description:
: While no enemy {{tip|minions}} or {{ui|Rift Herald|Rift Herald Mercenary}} are within range, gain 80% damage reduction, including against {{as|true damage}}.
: Base turrets have health regeneration, but cannot regenerate past their current segment. They are segmented at {{as|33%|health}}, {{as|66%|health}} and {{as|100% health}}.

1507.name: Overcharged
1507.description: : At 55 minutes, this turret begins to malfunction, losing {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resist}}. After 5 minutes, it will start breaking down, losing an increasing percentage of its {{as|{{sti|health|'''maximum''' health}}}} every 30 seconds.

1508.name: Anti-Tower Socks
1508.description: : {{tip|Turret}} basic attacks are modified to deal {{as|{{pp|key=%|14;11;8|Outer;Inner;Inhibitor/Nexus|type=turret type}} of this minion's '''maximum''' health}} as {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}}.

1509.name: Gusto
1509.description: : {{tip|Turret}} basic attacks are modified to deal {{as|45% of this minion's '''maximum''' health}} as {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}}.

1510.name: Phreakish Gusto
1510.description: : {{tip|Turret}} basic attacks are modified to deal {{as|70% of this minion's '''maximum''' health}} as {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}}.

1511.name: Super Mech Armor
1511.description: : {{tip|Turret}} basic attacks are modified to deal {{as|7% of this minion's '''maximum''' health}} as {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}}.

1512.name: Super Mech Power Field
1512.description: : Grants nearby minions (excluding super minions) {{as|35 armor}} and {{as|35 magic resistance}}.

1515.name: Turret Plating
1515.description: : Provides extra defensive measures. Attackers are rewarded for destroying portions of the plating. This item disappears after 14 minutes.

2001.name: Recall
2001.description: Teleports your champion to the Summoning Platform after 8 seconds. Any damage taken will cancel the teleport.

2015.name: Kircheis Shard
2015.description:
15 Attack Damage

Jolt
Energized Attacks deal an additional 50 magic damage.

2031.name: Refillable Potion
2031.description: : Holds charges that refill upon visiting the [[shop]].

2033.name: Corrupting Potion
2033.description:
Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 100 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

2049.name: Guardian's Amulet
2049.description: Recovery: Restore {{as|10 mana}} every 5 seconds. Manaless champions restore {{as|3 health}} instead.

2051.name: Guardian's Horn
2051.description: Undaunted: Reduces all sources of incoming champion damage by 15 ''({{fd|3.75}} against [[damage over time]] abilities)''.

2056.name: Stealth Ward
2056.description: Active - Consume: Places a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts 60 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area.

2065.name: Shurelya's Battlesong
2065.description: Inspiring Speech: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units {{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 4 seconds.

2161.name: Bandle Juice of Power
2161.description:
Drink to permanently gain 20 + 3% bonus Ability Power or 12 + 3% bonus Attack Damage. And a hat!

Made with 100% real cherries. Warning: May cause imbiber to deal tons of damage.

2162.name: Bandle Juice of Vitality
2162.description:
Drink to permanently gain 200 + 3% Health. And a hat!

Our specially formulated veggie blend is proven to harden your skin to resist even the strongest attacks!

2163.name: Bandle Juice of Haste
2163.description:
Drink to permanently gain 10 + 5% Ability Haste. And a hat!

For people who gotta go FAST. Made with lightning. REAL lightning!

2420.name: Seeker's Armguard
2420.description: Time Stop: Put yourself in {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, rendering you {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|invulnerable}} for the duration but also unable to move, declare [[basic attack]]s, cast [[champion ability|abilities]], use [[summoner spell]]s, or [[active ability items|activate items]].

2501.name: Overlord's Bloodmail
2501.description:
Tyranny: Gain {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} equal to {{as|{{fd|2.5}}% '''bonus''' health}}.
Retribution: Gain {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} equal to {{pp|0 to 12 by 1|0 to 70|key=%|key1=%|type='''missing''' health|color=health}} of your {{as|'''total''' attack damage}} from other sources.

2502.name: Unending Despair
2502.description: Anguish: Every 4 seconds after entering combat with champions, sap all enemy champions around you within 650 units to deal {{as|magic damage}} equal to {{as|3% of your '''bonus''' health}} to them and {{tip|heal}} yourself equal to 250% of the {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} damage dealt.

2503.name: Blackfire Torch
2503.description:
Baleful Blaze: Dealing [[ability damage]] burns enemies, causing them to take {{as|{{ap|60/6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6/6}}% AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds over 3 seconds, for a total of {{as|60|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 6% AP)}}. Against monsters, the burn deals {{as|10 '''bonus''' magic damage}} per tick, dealing a total of {{as|{{ap|(60/6)+10}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6/6}}% AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}} per tick for up to {{as|{{ap|60+(10*6)}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 6% AP)}}.
Blackfire: For each champion, epic monster, and large monster afflicted with ''Baleful Blaze's'' burn, increase your {{as|ability power}} by 4%.

2504.name: Kaenic Rookern
2504.description: Magebane: After not taking {{as|magic damage}} for 15 seconds, gain a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{as|magic damage}} equal to {{as|15% of '''maximum''' health}} until destroyed.

2508.name: Fated Ashes
2508.description: Inflame: Dealing [[ability damage]] burns enemies, causing them to take {{as|{{ap|15/6}} magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds over 3 seconds, for a total of {{as|15|magic damage}}. Against monsters, the burn deals {{as|{{fd|7.5}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} per tick, dealing a total of {{as|{{ap|(15/6)+7.5}} magic damage}} per tick for up to {{as|{{ap|15+(7.5*6)}}|magic damage}}.

2510.name: Dusk and Dawn
2510.description:
300 Health
70 Ability Power
20 Ability Haste
25% Attack Speed

Spellblade (0s)
After using an Ability, your next Attack deals bonus magic damage On-Hit and applies On-Hit effects an additional time.

2512.name: Fiendhunter Bolts
2512.description:
40% Attack Speed
25% Critical Strike Chance
4% Move Speed

Night Vigil
Gain 30 Ultimate Ability Haste.

Opening Barrage
After casting your Ultimate, your next 3 basic attacks gain 50% Attack Speed and Critically Strike for 75% of your normal Critical Strike damage for 8 seconds. If an attack would already Critically Strike, instead it deals 10% bonus true damage.

2517.name: Endless Hunger
2517.description:
60 Attack Damage
5% Omnivamp
20% Tenacity

Famine
Gain Ability Haste.

Feast
When a champion that you damaged within 3 seconds dies, gain 15% Omnivamp for 8 seconds.

2520.name: Bastionbreaker
2520.description:
55 Attack Damage
22 Lethality
15 Ability Haste

Shaped Charge (0s)
Dealing Ability damage to a Champion or Epic Monster deals an additional true damage.

Sabotage
Taking down a champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants Sabotage for 90 seconds. While you have Sabotage, your next Attack against an Epic Monster or Turret deals an additional true damage over 3 seconds.

2522.name: Actualizer
2522.description:
90 Ability Power
300 Mana
10 Ability Haste

Mana Made Real (0s)
For 8 seconds, your mana is Empowered. While Empowered, your spells cost 100% more Mana, you gain increased Ability damage, Shielding, and Healing, and your basic ability cooldowns progress 30% faster.

2523.name: Hexoptics C44
2523.description:
50 Attack Damage
25% Critical Strike Chance

Magnification
Deal up to 10% increased damage with Attacks, based on how far away the enemy is (max damage at 700 range).

Arcane Aim
When a champion that you damaged within 3 seconds dies, gain 100 additional attack range for 6 seconds.

2524.name: Bandlepipes
2524.description:
200 Health
15 Ability Haste
20 Armor
20 Magic Resist

Fanfare
Slowing or Immobilizing an enemy champion grants Fanfare for seconds. Fanfare grants you 20 Move Speed. While you have Fanfare, nearby allies, including yourself, gain Attack Speed.

2525.name: Protoplasm Harness
2525.description:
600 Health
15 Ability Haste

Lifeline (0s)
Taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30% causes you to gain maximum Health for 5 seconds, then heal Health over the duration. While regenerating Health, you gain 15% increased Size, 10% Move Speed, and 25% Tenacity.

2526.name: Whispering Circlet
2526.description:
200 Health
8% Heal and Shield Power
75% Base Mana Regen
300 Mana

Harmony
Gain % Heal and Shield Power.

Manaflow (8s, max 5 charges)
Landing Abilities grants 4 max Mana (doubled vs. champions).
Transforms into Diadem of Songs at 360 max Mana.

2530.name: Diadem of Songs
2530.description:
200 Health
8% Heal and Shield Power
1000 Mana
100% Base Mana Regen

Harmony
Gain % Heal and Shield Power.

Consonance
While you or any ally you've healed or shielded in the last 3 seconds is in combat with champions, each second, heal the lowest health nearby ally champion.

3001.name: Evenshroud
3001.description:
200 Health
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste


  • Coruscation: After Immobilizing champions or being Immobilized, cause that target and all nearby enemy champions to take 7% increased damage for 5 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Armor and Magic Resist.

3002.name: Trailblazer
3002.description: Lead the Way: While moving, generate 7 stacks of ''Momentum'' every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, granting up to {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} at 100 stacks after {{fd|3.75}} seconds of moving. At '''maximum''' stacks, you leave behind a path briefly that grants {{as|15% of your '''total''' movement speed}} as {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} to allied champions within. Basic attacks consume all stacks. If you are {{tip|melee}} and at '''maximum''' stacks, your next basic attack {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by 50% for 1 second.

3003.name: Archangel's Staff
3003.description:
Awe: Grants {{as|ability power}} equal to {{as|1% '''bonus''' mana}}.
Manaflow: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 5 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an [[champion ability|ability]] consumes a charge to grant {{as|5 '''bonus''' mana}}, increased to {{as|10|mana}} if they are a champion, up to a '''maximum''' of {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}.
: Transforms into {{ii|Seraph's Embrace}} at {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}.

3004.name: Manamune
3004.description:
Awe: Grants {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} equal to {{as|2% '''maximum''' mana}}.
Manaflow: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge [[on-hit]] and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an [[champion ability|ability]] to grant {{as|3 '''bonus''' mana}}, increased to {{as|6|mana}} for champion targets, up to a '''maximum''' of {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}.
: Transforms into {{ii|Muramana}} at {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}.

3005.name: Ghostcrawlers
3005.description:
45 Move Speed

Wall Walk (0s)
Gain the ability to walk through walls for 6 seconds. While inside walls, gain 125 move speed. Casting a spell or attacking will end this effect.

3010.name: Symbiotic Soles
3010.description:
Synchrony: Gain {{as|10 '''bonus''' movement speed}} while [[Combat status|out-of-combat]].
Symbiosis: After moving a total of 150,000 units of distance, capped at 500 units at a time for {{tip|dash|dashes}} and {{tip|blink|blinks}}, upgrade this item to {{ii|Synchronized Souls}}.

3011.name: Chemtech Putrifier
3011.description:
35 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
75% Base Mana Regen
15 Ability Haste


  • Puffcap Toxin: Dealing damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3012.name: Chalice of Blessing
3012.description:
200 Health
50% Base Mana Regen


  • Harmony: Gain 25% Base Health Regen per 25% Base Mana Regen.

    'These blessed waters still carry their power to the worthy.'

3013.name: Synchronized Souls
3013.description:
Voidborn: Gain {{si|Empowered Recall}}.
Synchrony: Gain {{as|45 '''bonus''' movement speed}} while out-of-combat.

3026.name: Guardian Angel
3026.description: Rebirth: Upon taking [[death|lethal damage]], enter {{tip|resurrection}} for 4 seconds, during which you are {{tip|invulnerable}}, {{tip|untargetable}}, and unable to act, and afterwards {{tip|heal}} for {{as|50% of '''base''' health}} and restore {{as|100% of '''maximum''' mana}} (300 second cooldown, starts after resurrection ends).

3032.name: Yun Tal Wildarrows
3032.description:
Practice Makes Lethal: Basic attacks {{tip|on-attack}} grant {{as|{{rd|{{fd|0.4}}%|{{fd|0.2}}%}} critical strike chance}} permanently, stacking up to {{rd|63|125}} times (capped at {{as|25% critical strike chance}}).
Flurry: Launching a basic attack against an enemy champion grants you {{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}} for 6 seconds (30 second cooldown, reduced by 1 second {{tip|on-hit}} and 2 seconds if the attack {{tip|critical strike|critically strikes}}).

3033.name: Mortal Reminder
3033.description: Grievous Wounds: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

3039.name: Atma's Reckoning
3039.description:
700 Health
20% Critical Strike Chance

Big Hands
Gain 0-30% Critical Strike Chance, scaling with your bonus Health.

3040.name: Seraph's Embrace
3040.description:
Awe: Grants {{as|ability power}} equal to {{as|2% '''bonus''' mana}}.
Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below {{as|30% of your '''maximum''' health}}, you first gain a {{tip|shield}} for 3 seconds that absorbs damage equal to {{as|18% '''maximum''' mana}} for 3 seconds.

3041.name: Mejai's Soulstealer
3041.description: Glory: Gain 4 stacks for each champion [[kill]] and 2 stacks for each [[assist]], up to a '''maximum''' of 25 stacks. For every stack, gain {{as|5 ability power}}, up to {{as|125|AP}} at '''maximum''' stacks. If you have at least 10 stacks, also gain {{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}. Lose 10 stacks on [[death]]. Stacks are preserved from {{ii|Dark Seal}}.

3042.name: Muramana
3042.description:
Awe: Grants {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} equal to {{as|2% '''maximum''' mana}}.
Shock: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] against champions deal {{as|{{as|{{fd|1.2}}% '''maximum''' mana}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}. Dealing [[Ability_effects#Triggering_from_champion_ability_damage|ability damage]] to champions deals {{as|{{as|{{rd|4%|3%}} '''maximum''' mana}} '''bonus''' physical damage|physical damage}}. Can only be triggered on the same target once every {{fd|6.5}} seconds from the same attack or cast.

3044.name: Phage
3044.description: Rage: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] grant {{as|{{rd|20|10}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

3047.name: Plated Steelcaps
3047.description: Plating: Reduces incoming [[damage]] from all [[basic attack]]s by 10% (''excluding [[turret]] attacks'').

3050.name: Zeke's Convergence
3050.description: Frostfire Tempest: Upon casting your ultimate ability, you summon a storm of flame and ice around you for 5 seconds, dealing{{ft|{{as|{{ap|30/4}} magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds|{{as|{{ap|30*5}} '''total''' magic damage}} over the duration}}to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 350 units and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 30% (45 second cooldown, starts on ultimate cast).

3053.name: Sterak's Gage
3053.description:
The Claws that Catch: Gain {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} equal to {{as|45% '''base''' AD}}.
Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below {{as|30% of your '''maximum''' health}}, you first gain a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs damage equal to {{as|60% of '''bonus''' health}} which decays over {{fd|4.5}} seconds.

3057.name: Sheen
3057.description: Spellblade: After using an [[Champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|100% '''base''' AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] ({{fd|1.5}} second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).

3065.name: Spirit Visage
3065.description: Boundless Vitality: Increases all {{tip|heal|healing}} and {{tip|shield|shielding}} received as well as {{stil|health regeneration}} by 25%.

3068.name: Sunfire Aegis
3068.description: Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal {{as|20 {{as|(+ 1% '''bonus''' health)}} magic damage|magic damage}} every second to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 325 (+ 100% '''bonus''' [[size]]) units, with the damage being increased by 50% against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

3070.name: Tear of the Goddess
3070.description:
Manaflow: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an [[champion ability|ability]] consumes a charge to grant {{as|3 '''bonus''' mana}}, increased to {{as|6|mana}} if they are a champion, up to '''maximum''' of {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}.
Helping Hand: Basic attacks deal {{as|5 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] against [[minions]].

3071.name: Black Cleaver
3071.description:
Carve: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to an enemy champion applies a stack of ''Carve'' for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack inflicts {{as|6% armor reduction}}, up to {{as|30%|armor}} at 5 stacks.
Fervor: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} grants you {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

3072.name: Bloodthirster
3072.description: Ichorshield: Convert the {{tip|healing}} received from {{sti|life steal}} in excess of {{as|'''maximum''' health}} into a {{tip|shield}} for up to {{pp|165 to 315 for 11|1;9 to 18|formula=165 base, then +15 per level starting from level 9.}}, which lasts until destroyed.

3073.name: Experimental Hexplate
3073.description:
Hexcharged: Gain 30 [[Haste#Ultimate haste|ultimate haste]].
Overdrive: Upon casting your ultimate ability, enter ''Overdrive'' to gain {{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}} and {{as|15% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 8 seconds (30 second cooldown, starts on ultimate cast).

3074.name: Ravenous Hydra
3074.description:
Cleave: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] deal {{as|{{rd|40% AD|20% AD}}|ad}} {{as|physical damage}} to other enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 350 radius centered around the target.
Ravenous Crescent: Deal {{as|80% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies within a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius in front of you.

3075.name: Thornmail
3075.description: Thorns: When struck by a basic attack [[on-hit]], deal {{as|20 {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' armor)}} magic damage|magic damage}} to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

3076.name: Bramble Vest
3076.description: Thorns: When struck by a basic attack [[on-hit]], deal {{as|10 magic damage}} to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

3077.name: Tiamat
3077.description:
Cleave: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] deal {{as|{{rd|40% AD|20% AD}}|ad}} {{as|physical damage}} to other enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 350 radius centered around the target.
Crescent: Deal {{as|75% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies within a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius in front of you.

3078.name: Trinity Force
3078.description:
Spellblade: After using an [[Champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|200% '''base''' AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] ({{fd|1.5}} second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).
Quicken: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] grant {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds

3082.name: Warden's Mail
3082.description: Rock Solid: Every first incoming instance of {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} {{tip|basic damage}} per {{tip|cast instance}} is [[Damage modifier|reduced]] by 15, with a '''maximum''' of 20% reduction each.

3083.name: Warmog's Armor
3083.description:
: Grants ''Warmog's Heart'' if you have at least {{as|2000 '''bonus''' health}}.
Warmog's Heart: {{stil|Health regeneration|Regenerate}}{{ft|{{as|{{fd|1.5}}% '''maximum''' health}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds|{{as|15% '''maximum''' health}} every 5 seconds}}if [[damage]] has not been taken in the last 8 seconds (3 seconds for damage from non-champions).
Warmog's Vitality: Gain {{as|'''bonus''' health}} equal to {{as|12% '''bonus''' health '''from items'''}}.

3084.name: Heartsteel
3084.description:
Colossal Consumption: While within 700 units of an enemy champion, generate a stack on them each second, stacking up to 3 times. Your next basic attack against a target with 3 stacks is empowered to consume them all to deal {{as|70|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 6% '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and grant you permanent {{as|'''bonus''' health}} equal to{{ft|8% of that amount|{{as|{{ap|70*0.08}} (+ {{ap|6*0.08}}% '''maximum''' health)}}}} (30 second cooldown per target).
Goliath: Gain {{as|{{pp|key=%|0 to 30 for 11|0 to 10000|type='''maximum''' health}}|hp}} increased size.

3085.name: Runaan's Hurricane
3085.description: Wind's Fury: Basic attacks [[on-attack]] fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies {{tt|in front of you|180{{degree}}}}, each dealing {{as|55% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}. Bolts apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects and are affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.

3087.name: Statikk Shiv
3087.description:
Electrospark: Your next 3 basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} within 8 seconds are empowered to deal {{as|60 '''bonus''' magic damage}}, increased to {{as|85|magic damage}} against non-champions. This bounces to the closest target within 500 units, repeating from the new target to strike up to 5 targets ({{pp|25 to 10 for 6|1;8 to 12}} second cooldown, starts after using the first empowered attack).
Electroshock: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets ''Electrospark's'' cooldown.

3089.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
3089.description: Magical Opus: Increase your {{as|ability power}} by 30%.

3091.name: Wit's End
3091.description: Fray: Basic attacks deal {{as|45 '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]].

3094.name: Rapid Firecannon
3094.description:
Energized: Moving and basic attacking generates ''Energize'' stacks, up to 100.
Sharpshooter: When fully {{tip|Energized}}, your next basic attack deals {{as|40 '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]]. ''Energized'' attacks gain 35% '''bonus''' range, capped at 150.

3095.name: Stormrazor
3095.description:
50 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
25% Critical Strike Chance

Energized
Moving and Attacking generates an Energized Attack.

Bolt
Your Energized Attack applies bonus magic damage and grants 45% Move Speed for 1.5s.

3097.name: Stormrazor
3097.description:
50 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
25% Critical Strike Chance

Energized
Moving and Attacking generates an Energized Attack.

Bolt
Your Energized Attack applies bonus magic damage and grants 45% Move Speed for 1.5s.

3100.name: Lich Bane
3100.description: Spellblade: After using an [[Champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds gains {{as|50% '''bonus''' attack speed}} and deals {{as|75% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]] ({{fd|1.5}} second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).

3102.name: Banshee's Veil
3102.description: Annul: Grants a {{tip|spell shield}} that blocks the next hostile ability (40 second cooldown, timer restarts upon taking damage from champions).

3107.name: Redemption
3107.description: Intervention: Call upon a 550-radius beam of light to strike upon the target location after {{fd|2.5}} seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area for the duration. Allies within the area are {{tip|heal|healed}} for {{pp|200 to 400|type=target's level}}, while enemy champions within take {{as|10% of target's '''maximum''' health}} as {{as|true damage}}. '''Can be used while [[death|dead]].'''

3109.name: Knight's Vow
3109.description:
Sacrifice: While your ''Worthy'' ally is {{tt|tethered to you|1250 units, center to edge}} and you are above {{as|30% of your '''maximum''' health}}, redirect 12% of the {{tt|pre-mitigation|Damage calculated before the Worthy ally's modifiers}} {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage they take to you as the respective damage type. Additionally, you {{tip|heal}} for 10% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt by your ''Worthy'' ally to champions.
Pledge: Designate the target allied champion as being ''Worthy'', forming a {{tip|tether}} between you and them. Champions can only be designated as ''Worthy'' by one '''Knight's Vow''' at a time. You cannot be designated as ''Worthy'' by an ally's '''Knight's Vow'''.

3110.name: Frozen Heart
3110.description: Winter's Caress: {{tip|Cripple|Cripples}} the [[attack speed]] of enemy champions within {{tt|700 units|center to edge}} by 20%.

3112.name: Guardian's Orb
3112.description: Recovery: Gain {{as|10 '''bonus''' mana regeneration}}. Manaless champions gain {{as|15 '''bonus''' health regeneration}} instead.

3115.name: Nashor's Tooth
3115.description: Icathian Bite: Basic attacks deal {{as|15 {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}} [[on-hit]].

3116.name: Rylai's Crystal Scepter
3116.description: Rimefrost: Dealing {{tip|ability damage}} {{tip|slow|slows}} affected [[unit]]s by 30% for 1 second.

3117.name: Mobility Boots
3117.description:
25 Move Speed
When out of combat for at least 5 seconds, increase this item's effect to 45.

3118.name: Malignance
3118.description:
Scorn: Gain 20 [[Haste#Ultimate haste|ultimate haste]].
Hatefog: Dealing [[ability damage]] to enemy champions with your [[champion ability|ultimate ability]] creates a {{pp|type=ultimate's damage instance|251;251.8;253.1;255.5;259.8;267.3;280.7;304.2;345.9;419.7;550|0 to 823|formula=250 + 2^(damage dealt/100)}} radius scorched zone beneath them for 3 seconds, applying a ''Curse'' to enemies within that deals {{ft|{{as|{{ap|60/4}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|5/4}}% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds|{{as|{{ap|60*3}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|5*3}}% AP)}} {{as|'''total''' magic damage}} over the duration}} and reduces their {{as|magic resistance by 10}} (3 second cooldown per target, starts on zone creation).

3119.name: Winter's Approach
3119.description:
Awe: Grants {{as|'''bonus''' health}} equal to {{as|15% '''bonus''' mana}}.
Manaflow: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge [[on-hit]] and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an [[champion ability|ability]] to grant {{as|3 '''bonus''' mana}}, increased to {{as|6|mana}} for champion targets, up to a '''maximum''' of {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}.
: Transforms into {{ii|Fimbulwinter}} at {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}.

3121.name: Fimbulwinter
3121.description:
Awe: Grants {{as|'''bonus''' health}} equal to {{as|15% '''bonus''' mana}}.
Everlasting: {{tip|immobilize|Immobilizing}}, or {{tip|slow|slowing}} if you are {{tip|melee}}, an enemy champion grants a 100 {{as|(+ {{fd|4.5}}% '''current''' mana)}} {{tip|shield}} for 3 seconds (8 second cooldown). The shield's strength is increased{{ft|by 80%|to 100 {{as|(+ {{ap|4.5*1.8}}% '''current''' mana)}}}}if there is more than one enemy champion within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1200 units.

3123.name: Executioner's Calling
3123.description: Grievous Wounds: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

3124.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
3124.description:
Wrath: Basic attacks deal {{as|30 '''bonus''' magic damage}} on-hit.
Seething Strike: Basic attacks grant {{as|8% '''bonus''' attack speed}} for 3 seconds, stacking up to 4 times for a total of {{as|32% '''bonus''' attack speed}}. At maximum stacks, basic attacks {{tip|on-attack}} also grant a ''Phantom'' stack for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 ''Phantom'' stacks, the next basic attack consumes all of those stacks {{tip|on-attack}} to trigger a ''Phantom Hit'' that applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects to the target after a {{fd|0.15}} second delay.

3128.name: Deathfire Grasp
3128.description:
120 Ability Power
10 Ability Haste



Active - The Silence: Deal magic damage equal to 15% of the Target's Max Health, and then amplify damage they take by 15% for 4 seconds (90 (0s)).

3131.name: Sword of the Divine
3131.description:
30 Attack Damage
25% Attack Speed
18 Lethality



Active - Divine Blessing: Grants 100% Attack Speed and 100% Critical Strike Chance for 3 seconds or 3 basic attacks (90 (0s)).

3137.name: Cryptbloom
3137.description: Life From Death: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them summons a nova that radiates from the location of their death over {{fd|1.75}} seconds, {{tip|heal|healing}} you and allied champions hit for 100 {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}.

3139.name: Mercurial Scimitar
3139.description: Quicksilver: Removes all {{tip|crowd control}} debuffs (except {{tip|Airborne}}) from your champion and grants {{as|50% '''bonus total''' movement speed}} and {{tip|ghosted|ghosting}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

3140.name: Quicksilver Sash
3140.description: Quicksilver: Removes all {{tip|crowd control}} debuffs (except {{tip|Airborne}}) from your champion.

3142.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
3142.description:
Haunt: Gain {{as|{{rd|20|10}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} while out-of-combat with enemy champions for 3 seconds.
Wraith Step: Gain {{as|{{rd|20%|15%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} and {{tip|ghosted|ghosting}} for {{rd|6|4}} seconds.

3143.name: Randuin's Omen
3143.description:
Resilience: Reduces incoming damage from {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} by 30%.
Humility: Unleash a shockwave around you that {{tip|slow|slows}} nearby enemies by 70% for 2 seconds.

3144.name: Scout's Slingshot
3144.description: Bullseye: Damaging an enemy champion deals {{as|40 '''bonus''' magic damage}} (40 second cooldown, reduced by 1 second {{tip|on-attack}}).

3145.name: Hextech Alternator
3145.description: Revved: Damaging an enemy champion deals {{as|65 '''bonus''' magic damage}}.

3146.name: Hextech Gunblade
3146.description:
80 Ability Power
40 Attack Damage
10% Omnivamp



ACTIVE (0s)
Lightning Bolt
Shocks the target enemy champion, dealing magic damage and slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

3147.name: Haunting Guise
3147.description: Madness: For each second in combat with enemy champions, deal 2% increased damage, stacking up to 3 times for a total of 6%.

3152.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
3152.description: Supersonic: {{tip|Dash}} 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, then unleash an arc of 7 rockets forward which upon collision explode in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|185-radius|estimated}} area. Enemies within {{tt|85 units|center-to-edge, estimated}} of your dash, a {{tt|400 unit|center-to-edge, estimated}} distance behind you{{bug|2}}, and ones hit by any rocket's explosion are dealt {{as|100 {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}}, once per cast.

3153.name: Blade of the Ruined King
3153.description:
Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] equal to {{as|{{rd|9%|6%}} of the target's '''current''' health}}, with a '''maximum''' of 100 against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
Clawing Shadows: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to {{tip|slow}} the target by 30% for 1 second.

3155.name: Hexdrinker
3155.description: Lifeline: If you would take {{as|magic damage}} that would reduce you below {{as|30% of your '''maximum''' health}}, you first gain a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{as|{{rd|110 to 280|82.5 to 210|pp=true}} magic damage}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.

3156.name: Maw of Malmortius
3156.description: Lifeline: If you would take {{as|magic damage}} that would reduce you below {{as|30% of your '''maximum''' health}}, you first gain a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{as|{{rd|200|150}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{rd|150%|{{fd|112.5}}%}} '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|magic damage}} for 3 seconds. Additionally, triggering this effect grants you {{as|10% omnivamp}} until the end of [[combat status|combat]].

3157.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
3157.description: Time Stop: Put yourself in {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, rendering you {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|invulnerable}} for the duration but also unable to move, declare [[basic attack]]s, cast [[champion ability|abilities]], use [[summoner spell]]s, or [[active ability items|activate items]].

3158.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
3158.description: Ionian Insight: Gain 10 [[Haste#Summoner spell haste|summoner spell haste]].

3161.name: Spear of Shojin
3161.description:
Dragonforce: Gain 25 [[Haste#Basic ability haste|basic ability haste]].
Focused Will: Dealing [[ability damage]] with a non-innate [[champion ability|ability]] grants a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and up to once per {{tip|cast instance}} per second and every second for [[damage over time]] abilities. For each stack, your non-{{tip|basic damage}} dealt by non-[[item|items]] gain 3% increased damage, for a total increase of 12% at '''maximum''' stacks.

3165.name: Morellonomicon
3165.description: Grievous Wounds: Dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

3170.name: Swiftmarch
3170.description:
Fleetfooted: Gain 25% [[slow resist]].
Noxian Fervor: Gain {{tip|adaptive force}} equal to {{as|5% of your '''total''' movement speed}}.

3171.name: Crimson Lucidity
3171.description:
Ionian Insight: Gain 10 [[Haste#Summoner spell haste|summoner spell haste]].
Noxian Haste: {{tip|heal|Healing}}, {{tip|shield|shielding}} or buffing an ally, damaging abilities against champions, and using [[summoner spell]]s grants you {{as|{{rd|10%|8%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 4 seconds. This can be triggered from the same {{tip|cast instance}} only once every 4 seconds.

3172.name: Zephyr
3172.description: Like the Wind: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] grant a stack of ''Like The Wind'' for 6 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks. For each stack, gain {{as|5% '''bonus''' movement speed|ms}}, stacking up to 5 times for a total of {{as|25%|ms}}.

3173.name: Chainlaced Crushers
3173.description: Noxian Persistence: Taking {{as|magic damage}} from champions grants you a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{pp|10 to 120|color=md}} {{as|(+ 4% '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} for 4 seconds.

3174.name: Armored Advance
3174.description:
Plating: Reduces incoming [[damage]] from all [[basic attack]]s by 10% (''excluding [[turret]] attacks'').
Noxian Endurance: Taking {{as|physical damage}} from champions grants you a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{pp|10 to 120|color=pd}} {{as|(+ 4% '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|physical damage}} for 4 seconds.

3176.name: Forever Forward
3176.description:
Voidborn: Gain {{si|Empowered Recall}}.
Noxian Synchrony: Gain {{as|45 (+ 8% '''total''' movement speed) '''bonus''' movement speed}} while out-of-combat.

3179.name: Umbral Glaive
3179.description:
Blackout: When near an enemy [[Stealth#Stealthed_traps_and_wards|stealthed]] {{tip|ward}} or {{tip|stealthed trap|trap}}, gain ''Blackout'' for 8 seconds.
Blackout: You {{tip|disabled ward|disable}} surrounding stealthed wards, as well as {{tip|expose}} and {{tip|true sight|reveal}} nearby stealthed wards and traps while ''Blackout'' is active.
Extinguish: Your [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|{{rd|2|1}} '''bonus''' true damage}} to wards.

3181.name: Hullbreaker
3181.description:
Skipper: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] against any enemy grant a stack for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. At '''maximum''' stacks, or 4 stacks, your next basic attack against a champion, epic monster, or structure consumes all stacks to deal {{as|{{rd|120%|{{ap|120*0.7}}%}} '''base''' AD|ad}} {{as|(+ {{rd|5%|{{ap|5*0.7}}%}} '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, increased to {{as|{{rd|300%|{{ap|300*0.7}}%}} '''base''' AD|ad}} {{as|(+ {{rd|10%|{{ap|10*0.7}}%}} '''maximum''' health)}} against structures.
Boarding Party: Allied {{ui|Blue Siege Minion|link=Siege minion|siege minions}} and {{ui|Blue Super Minion|link=Super minion|super minions}} within {{tip|er|icononly=true}} {{tt|1050|Estimated}} units gain {{rd|70 to 130 for 11|70*0.5 to 130*0.5 for 11|levels=1;9 to 18|pp=true}} {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}, as well as 10% increased size.

3190.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
3190.description: Devotion: Grants you and allied champions within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 850 units a {{tip|shield}} for {{pp|200 to 360|type=target's level}} that decays over {{fd|2.5}} seconds.

3193.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
3193.description:
60 Armor
60 Magic Resist
15 Ability Haste


  • Fortify: Taking damage from a champion grants a stack of Armor and Magic Resist for 6 seconds.

    Max 5 stacks; 1 per champion.

    Active - Unbreakable: Gain a Shield that decays and grow in size.

3222.name: Mikael's Blessing
3222.description: Purify: Remove all {{tip|crowd control}} debuffs (except {{tip|Airborne}}, {{tip|Blind}}, {{tip|Disarm}}, {{tip|Nearsight}}, and {{tip|Suppression}}) from yourself or the target allied champion and {{tip|heal}} the target for {{pp|100 to 250|type=target's level}}.

3302.name: Terminus
3302.description:
Shadow: Basic attacks deal {{as|30 '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]].
Juxtaposition: Basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} against champions alternate between ''Light'' and ''Dark'' hits, each one granting a bonus for 5 seconds that stacks up to 3 times. ''Light'' hits grant {{pp|6 to 8 for 3|1;11;14|type=level}} {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}} while ''Dark'' hits grant 10% {{as|armor penetration}} and {{as|magic penetration}}, for a total of {{pp|6*3 to 8*3}} '''bonus''' resistances and 30% resistances penetration at maximum stacks of each.

3340.name: Stealth Ward
3340.description: Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible {{tip|Totem Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area for {{pp|90 to 120|type=average champion level}} seconds.

3348.name: Arcane Sweeper (Trinket)
3348.description: : Summons a mist over the target location for 5 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area in a 375 radius and {{tip|true sight|revealing}} enemy {{tip|stealthed trap|traps}} within for 3 seconds.

3363.name: Farsight Alteration
3363.description: Trinket: Places a visible {{tip|Farsight Ward}} at the target location that grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area, including over [[terrain]] and through [[brush]] and lasting indefinitely. Also grants sight of the area in a 800 radius for 2 seconds. Upon detecting an enemy champion, the ward will increase its sight radius to 800 units and destroy itself after 3 seconds.

3364.name: Oracle Lens
3364.description: : Consume one charge to summon a {{tip|Sweeper Drone}} that escorts you for the next 6 seconds, detecting nearby enemies that are not {{tip|sight|visible}}.

3430.name: Rite of Ruin
3430.description:
Wrath and Ruin: Casting an [[Champion ability|ability]] grants {{sti|{{fd|2.5}}% critical strike chance}} for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of {{sti|critical strike chance|20%}}.
Salvage the Wreckage: Casting an ability has a {{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=critical strike chance|0 to 100 for 11|0 to 100|formula=1% per 1% critical strike chance, capped at 100% critical strike chance}} chance to grant you or your ally a {{tip|shield}} for 3 seconds that absorbs {{pp|70 to 210}} {{as|(+ 25% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} damage.

3504.name: Ardent Censer
3504.description: Sanctify: {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} allied champions (''excluding yourself'') enhances you and them for 6 seconds, granting {{as|25% '''bonus''' attack speed|attack speed}} and {{as|20 '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]] on basic attacks.

3508.name: Essence Reaver
3508.description: Essence Drain: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] restore {{as|15|mana}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)|ad}} {{as|mana}}.

3742.name: Dead Man's Plate
3742.description:
Shipwrecker: While moving, generates 7 stacks of ''Momentum'' every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, granting up to {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} at 100 stacks after {{fd|3.75}} seconds of moving. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal {{as|{{pp|0 to 40 for 11|0 to 100|type=Momentum|label1=stacks of Momentum|formula=0.4 for every 1 stack of Momentum, capped at 40}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|0 to 100 for 11|0 to 100|key=%|type=Momentum|label1=stacks of Momentum|formula=1% for every 1 stack of Momentum, capped at 100}} '''base''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]].
Unsinkable: Gain 15% {{tip|slow resist}}.

3748.name: Titanic Hydra
3748.description:
Cleave: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] deal {{as|{{rd|1%|{{fd|0.5}}%}} '''maximum''' health|hp}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to the target and {{as|{{rd|3%|{{fd|1.5}}%}} '''maximum''' health|hp}} {{as|physical damage}} to other enemies in a cone in the direction of the primary target.
Titanic Crescent: Your next basic attack within 10 seconds empowers ''Cleave'' to deal {{as|{{rd|4%|2%}} '''maximum''' health|hp}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to the primary target and {{as|{{rd|9%|{{fd|4.5}}%}} '''maximum''' health|hp}} {{as|physical damage}} to secondary targets (10 second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).

3802.name: Lost Chapter
3802.description: Enlighten: Upon leveling up, restores {{as|20% of '''maximum''' mana}} over 3 seconds.

3803.name: Catalyst of Aeons
3803.description: Eternity: Restore {{as|mana}} equal to 10% of {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} taken from champions, and {{tip|heal}} for an amount equal to {{as|25% of mana spent}}, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.

3814.name: Edge of Night
3814.description: Annul: Grants a {{tip|spell shield}} that blocks the next hostile ability (40 second cooldown, timer restarts upon taking damage from champions).

3865.name: World Atlas
3865.description:
Support Quest: Earn {{g|400}} through ''Shared Riches'' to automatically upgrade to {{ii|Runic Compass}}, gaining the ''Ward'' active with 3 wards in stock. Shared Riches: Grants a '''Shared Riches''' charge every 20 seconds, up to 3 charges. When an allied champion is within {{tip|er|icononly=true}} 1050 units of you, consume a charge in the following ways:
Kill a minion by any means, granting you {{g|15}} and the nearest allied champion kill {{g|gold}}. Damaging a minion {{as|'''below''' {{rd|50%|30%}} of its '''maximum''' health}} {{tip|execute|executes}} it.
Damage an enemy champion or structure with a basic attack or ability, granting you {{g|{{rd|22|20}}}}. A charge may be consumed this way only once per attack or ability. : Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills. : Receives {{ii|Lane Swap Detector}} penalties if detected within the top or middle [[lane]]s early in the game.

3866.name: Runic Compass
3866.description:
Support Quest: Earn {{g|800}} through ''Shared Riches'' to automatically upgrade to {{ii|Bounty of Worlds}}, increasing the ''Ward'' active to instead have 4 wards in stock. Shared Riches: Grants a '''Shared Riches''' charge every 20 seconds, up to 3 charges. When an allied champion is within {{tip|er|icononly=true}} 1050 units of you, consume a charge in the following ways:
Kill a minion by any means, granting you {{g|20}} and the nearest allied champion kill {{g|gold}}. Damaging a minion {{as|'''below''' {{rd|50%|30%}} of its '''maximum''' health}} {{tip|execute|executes}} it.
Damage an enemy champion or structure with a basic attack or ability, granting you {{g|{{rd|24|22}}}}. A charge may be consumed this way only once per attack or ability. : Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills. Ward: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. '''Warding''' charges refill upon visiting the shop.

3867.name: Bounty of Worlds
3867.description:
Upgrade: You have completed the support quest and can now upgrade this item, '''Bounty of Worlds''', for free into ''{{ii|Bloodsong}}'', ''{{ii|Celestial Opposition}}'', ''{{ii|Dream Maker}}'', ''{{ii|Solstice Sleigh}}'', or ''{{ii|Zaz'Zak's Realmspike}}'' by selecting one of them from a custom menu in the HUD or the shop. ''The upgrade can be done outside the shop using the menu.''
: Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Ward: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

3869.name: Celestial Opposition
3869.description:
Blessing of the Mountain: Become ''Blessed'' to reduce incoming champion damage by {{rd|35%|25%}}, lingering for 2 seconds after taking damage from a champion. After the linger ends, you lose ''Blessed'' to unleash a shockwave around you that {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies within 500 units by 50% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds (18 second cooldown, timer restarts upon taking damage from champions).
: Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Ward: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

3870.name: Dream Maker
3870.description:
Dream Maker: Every 8 seconds, you gain a ''Blue Dream Bubble'' and a ''Purple Dream Bubble''. Granting a {{tip|heal}} or {{tip|shield}} to an allied champion ''(excluding yourself)'' causes you to blow both of your ''Dream Bubbles'' to them, empowering them for 3 seconds. The ''Blue Bubble'' reduces the next instance of non-{{tip|minion}} damage they take by {{pp|75 to 255 for 13|1;7 to 18|type=your level}} and the ''Purple Bubble'' grants them {{as|{{pp|50 to 170 for 13|1;7 to 18|type=your level}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]] on their next basic attack.
: Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Ward: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

3871.name: Zaz'Zak's Realmspike
3871.description:
Void Explosion: Dealing [[ability damage]] to an enemy champion creates an explosion at their location after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, dealing {{as|10|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} {{as|(+ 3% of each target's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area, capped at 300 against {{tip|monsters}}.
: Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Ward: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

3876.name: Solstice Sleigh
3876.description:
Going Sledding: {{tip|Slow|Slowing}} or {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} an enemy champion causes you and the most wounded allied champion within 1500 units to gain {{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}} decaying over {{fd|2.5}} seconds and {{as|{{pp|50 to 230 for 13|1;7 to 18|type=your level}}|hp}} {{as|'''bonus''' health}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
: Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Ward: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

3877.name: Bloodsong
3877.description:
Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|100% '''base''' AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]]. If the target is a champion, inflict them with ''Expose Weakness'' for 4 seconds, causing them to take {{rd|8%|5%}} increased damage from all sources ({{fd|1.5}} second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).
: Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Ward: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

3916.name: Oblivion Orb
3916.description: Grievous Wounds: Dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

4003.name: Lifeline
4003.description: Soul Anchor: Mark your current location. After 4 seconds, you automatically {{tip|blink}} to the marked location after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay. ''Soul Anchor'' may be recast within its duration to manually blink to the marked location after the same delay (45 second cooldown, starts after the blink).

4004.name: Spectral Cutlass
4004.description:
50 Attack Damage
15 Lethality
4% Move Speed

Active - Soul Anchor (0s)
Mark your current location. After 4 seconds, return to that location. You may recast at any point during Soul Anchor's duration to return to your marked location early.

4005.name: Imperial Mandate
4005.description: Coordinated Fire: Abilities that {{tip|slow}} or {{tip|immobilize}} enemy champions mark them for 5 seconds. Allied champions that damage marked enemies consume the mark to deal {{as|10% of the target's '''current''' health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} (9 second cooldown per target, starts upon mark application).

4010.name: Bloodletter's Curse
4010.description:
60 Ability Power
350 Health
15 Ability Haste

Vile Decay
Dealing magic damage with abilities or passives to champions reduces their Magic Resist by 7.5% for 6 seconds, up to 30%.

4011.name: Sword of Blossoming Dawn
4011.description:
Effervescence: Gain {{as|{{fd|1.2}}% '''bonus''' attack speed}} per 1% {{stil|heal and shield power}}.
Peppermint: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] cause the most wounded and nearest allied champion to be {{tip|heal|healed}} for {{pp|15 to 45}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 7% AP)}}.

4012.name: Sin Eater
4012.description:
300 Health
45 Armor
45 Magic Resist
30% Tenacity


  • The Feast: Whenever a nearby ally champion becomes affected by an immobilizing crowd control effect, instead you are stunned for that duration. (20 (0s)).

4013.name: Lightning Braid
4013.description:
70 Ability Power
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist
30% Tenacity


  • Chain Lightning: You deal 20% reduced ability damage. On a 1 second cadence, enemies you've damaged with abilities chain 66.6% of the ability damage you've dealt them to another nearby enemy, prioritizing champions.

4015.name: Perplexity
4015.description: Giant Slayer: Deal {{pp|type='''maximum''' health difference|color=health|key=%|0 to 15 for 11|0 to 2500|formula=0.6% per 100 greater '''maximum''' health}} increased damage against enemy champions with greater {{as|'''maximum''' health}} than you.

4016.name: Wordless Promise
4016.description:
Promise: While your ''Promised'' ally is {{tt|tethered|1250 units, center to edge}} to you, gain {{as|ability power}} equal to {{as|20% of ''Promised'' ally's AP}}, and grant your ''Promised'' ally {{as|ability haste}} equal to {{as|20% of your ability haste}}. ''Increases and decreases to each teammate's stats recalculate this effect.''
Promise: Make a ''Promise'' to the target allied champion, forming a {{tip|tether}} between you and them.

4017.name: Hellfire Hatchet
4017.description: Char: Your next ability hit applies a {{as|Burn}} that deals {{ft|{{pp|5 to (2*5) for 11|0 to 2000|key=%|type='''maximum''' health difference|showtype=false|round=3|color=health}} {{as|(+ {{pp|2/10 to (2*2)/10 for 11|0 to 2000|key=%|type='''maximum''' health difference|showtype=false|round=3}} per 1 Lethality)|lethality}} {{as|(based on '''maximum''' health difference)|hp}} {{as|of the target's '''current''' health}} {{as|physical damage}} seconds over 4 seconds.|{{pp|5/8 to (2*5/8) for 11|0 to 2000|key=%|type='''maximum''' health difference|showtype=false|round=3|color=health}} {{as|(+ {{pp|0.2/8 to (2*0.2)/8 for 11|0 to 2000|key=%|type='''maximum''' health difference|showtype=false|round=3}} per 1 Lethality)|lethality}} {{as|(based on '''maximum''' health difference)|hp}} {{as|of the target's '''current''' health}} {{as|physical damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} over 4 seconds.}}

4401.name: Force of Nature
4401.description: Steadfast: Taking {{as|magic damage}} from champions grants a stack of ''Steadfast'' for 7 seconds, stacking up to 8 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent {{as|magic damage}} from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Each incoming basic attack, ability per {{tip|cast instance}}, or item effect can only grant 1 stack of ''Steadfast'' from their damage every 1 second. At '''maximum''' stacks, gain {{as|70 '''bonus''' magic resistance}} and {{as|6% '''bonus''' movement speed}}.

4402.name: Innervating Locket
4402.description:
30 Attack Damage
400 Health
300 Mana
10 Ability Haste


  • Eternity: Restore Mana equal to 15% of premitigation damage taken from champions, and Health equal to 25% of Mana spent, up to 20 Health per cast, per second.
  • Innervate: After using an ability, restore 3% missing Health and 3% missing Mana over 3 seconds.

    "Cast down the Noxians"
    Bobdyr, Temple Guardsman

4403.name: The Golden Spatula
4403.description:
70 Attack Damage
120 Ability Power
50% Attack Speed
30% Critical Strike Chance
250 Health
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist
250 Mana
20 Ability Haste
10% Move Speed
10% Life Steal
100% Base Health Regen
100% Base Mana Regen


  • Doing Something: You are permanently On Fire!

    "It must do something...
    Declined, it does EVERYTHING"

4628.name: Horizon Focus
4628.description:
Hypershot: Dealing [[Ability_effects#Triggering_from_champion_ability_damage|ability damage]] to a champion at {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 600 or more units away from the cast position {{tip|standard sight|reveals}} them for 6 seconds.
Focus: Upon triggering ''Hypershot'', grant {{tip|sight}} of the {{tt|area|Grants sight through terrain and brush}} {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1400 units around the target for 2 seconds and apply ''Hypershot's'' effects to enemy champions within the area for 3 seconds.

4629.name: Cosmic Drive
4629.description: Spelldance: Dealing {{as|magic|magic damage}} or {{as|true|true damage}} damage to an enemy champion grants you {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed|ms}} for 4 seconds.

4632.name: Verdant Barrier
4632.description: Annul: Grants a {{tip|spell shield}} that blocks the next hostile ability (60 second cooldown, timer restarts upon taking damage from champions).

4633.name: Riftmaker
4633.description:
Void Corruption: For each second [[combat status|in combat]] with champions, deal 2% increased damage, stacking up to 4 times for a total of 8% increased damage. At maximum stacks, gain {{as|{{rd|10%|6%}} omnivamp}}.
Void Infusion: Gain {{as|ability power}} equal to {{as|2% '''bonus''' health}}.

4636.name: Night Harvester
4636.description:
90 Ability Power
300 Health
25 Ability Haste


  • Soulrend: Damaging a champion with Attacks or Abilities deals an additional magic damage and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (30 (0s) per champion).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

4638.name: Watchful Wardstone
4638.description:
Arcane Cache: Purchasing a {{ii|Control Ward}} [[ammunition|stocks]] it as a charge, up to maximum of 3.
: Consumes a charge of ''Arcane Cache'' to place a visible {{tip|Control Ward}} at the target location (600 range).

4643.name: Vigilant Wardstone
4643.description:
Arcane Cache: Purchasing a {{ii|Control Ward}} [[ammunition|stocks]] it as a charge, up to maximum of 3.
Behold: Increase your {{tip|Stealth Ward}}, {{tip|Totem Ward}}, and {{tip|Control Ward}} caps by 1.
: Consumes a charge of ''Arcane Cache'' to place a visible {{tip|Control Ward}} at the target location (600 range).

4644.name: Crown of the Shattered Queen
4644.description:
85 Ability Power
250 Health
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste


  • Safeguard: You are Safeguarded, reducing incoming champion damage by 40%. Safeguard persists for 2.5 seconds after taking champion damage. (40 (0s)).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 1% Move Speed and 8 Ability Power.

    Item cooldown is restarted when damage is taken from champions.

4645.name: Shadowflame
4645.description: Cinderbloom: Your {{as|magic|magic damage}} and {{as|true|true damage}} damage will {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for 120% damage against enemies {{as|below 40% '''maximum''' health}}.

4646.name: Stormsurge
4646.description:
Stormraider: Dealing damage to an enemy champion equal to {{as|25% of their '''maximum''' health}} within {{fd|2.5}} seconds inflicts them with ''Squall'' (30 second cooldown, starts on ''Squall's'' application).
Squall: After 2 seconds of having applied ''Squall'', strike the target with lightning, dealing {{as|125|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to them. If the target dies before being struck, they emit an electric field instantly that shocks all enemy champions near them, dealing them the same damage.

6029.name: Ironspike Whip
6029.description:
30 Attack Damage



Active - Crescent: Deal damage to nearby enemies.

6032.name: Stat Bonus
6032.description: Active - Consume: Automatically open a semi-random selection for a permanent stat bonus. And a hat!

6035.name: Silvermere Dawn
6035.description:
40 Attack Damage
300 Health
40 Magic Resist



Active - Quicksilver: Remove all crowd control debuffs and gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance.

6333.name: Death's Dance
6333.description:
Ignore Pain: Reduces {{rd|30%|10%}} of all {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage received and instead stores the damage to successively take it as {{as|true damage}} over 3 seconds, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes ''Ignore Pain's'' remaining stored damage and {{tip|heals}} you for {{as|75% '''bonus''' AD}} over 2 seconds.

6609.name: Chempunk Chainsword
6609.description: Hackshorn: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

6610.name: Sundered Sky
6610.description: Lightshield Strike: Your next basic attack against a champion is empowered to {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{tt|175% damage|Affected by critical damage modifiers}} and {{tip|heal}} you for {{as|{{rd|100%|50%}} '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ 6% of your '''missing''' health)}} (8 second cooldown per target). Excess healing beyond {{as|'''maximum''' health}} is converted to {{as|'''bonus''' health}} for 8 seconds.

6616.name: Staff of Flowing Water
6616.description: Rapids: {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} allied champions (''excluding yourself'') grants you and them {{as|45 ability power}} for 6 seconds.

6617.name: Moonstone Renewer
6617.description: Starlit Grace: {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} an allied champion chains the effect to the other nearest allied champion within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 800 units of them (''excluding yourself''), granting them 30% of the heal or 35% of the shield's initial strength. If no other allied champions are in the radius, grant the same target an additional 30% of the heal or 35% of the shield.

6620.name: Echoes of Helia
6620.description: Soul Siphon: Damaging an enemy champion with a basic attack or [[ability damage]] grants a ''Soul Shard'', up to 2. {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} an allied champion (''excluding yourself'') consumes all ''Soul Shards'' to heal them for 65 per shard and deal {{as|50 magic damage}} per shard to the nearest enemy champion within 1100 units of the ally.

6621.name: Dawncore
6621.description: First Light: Gain {{as|2% heal and shield power|hsp}} and {{as|10 ability power}} for every additional {{as|100% '''base''' mana regeneration}}.

6630.name: Goredrinker
6630.description:
55 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
8% Omnivamp



Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 75 Health and 3 Ability Haste.

Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal damage to nearby enemies. Restore Health for each champion hit.

6631.name: Stridebreaker
6631.description:
Cleave: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] deal {{as|{{rd|40% AD|20% AD}}|ad}} {{as|physical damage}} to other enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 350 radius centered around the target.
Breaking Shockwave: Deal {{as|80% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius centered around you and {{tip|slow}} them by 35% for 3 seconds. For each champion hit, gain {{as|35% '''bonus''' movement speed}} decaying over 3 seconds. Can move while casting.

6653.name: Liandry's Torment
6653.description:
Torment: Dealing [[ability damage]] burns enemies, causing them to take{{ft|{{as|1% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds over 3 seconds, capped at 20 per tick against monsters.|{{as|6% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|'''total''' magic damage}} over 3 seconds, capped at 120 against monsters.}}
Suffering: For each second in combat with enemy champions, deal 2% increased damage, stacking up to 3 times for a total of 6%.

6655.name: Luden's Companion
6655.description: Fire: Gain 6 ''Shot Charge'' stacks to fire. Dealing [[ability damage]] to an enemy consumes all ''Shot Charges'' to deal {{as|75|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to them and, for each charge consumed beyond the first, an additional enemy within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 600 units of them, firing an orb at each secondary target that impacts after {{rutngt|0.5}} to deal the damage. If the number of additional targets fired at is less than the number of charges consumed,{{ft|deal an additional {{as|{{pp|75*0.2 to 75*5*0.2 for 5|1 to 5|changedisplay=true|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|5*0.2 to 5*5*0.2 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}} AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to the primary target, for a total of {{as|{{pp|(75*0.2)+75 to (75*5*0.2)+75 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|(5*0.2)+5 to (5*5*0.2)+5 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}} AP)}}.|deal an additional 20% damage to the primary target for each remaining charge.}}

6656.name: Everfrost
6656.description:
70 Ability Power
250 Health
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste



Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 10 Ability Power.


Active - Glaciate: Deal damage in a cone, Slowing enemies hit. Enemies at the center of the cone are Rooted instead.

6657.name: Rod of Ages
6657.description:
Timeless: This item gains {{as|10 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|30 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|3 ability power}} every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of {{as|100 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|300 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|30 ability power}}. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18).
Eternity: Restore {{as|mana}} equal to 10% of {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} taken from champions, and {{tip|heal}} for an amount equal to {{as|25% of mana spent}}, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.

6660.name: Bami's Cinder
6660.description: Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal {{as|15 magic damage}} every second to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 325 (+ 100% '''bonus''' [[size]]) units, with the damage being increased by 50% against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

6662.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
6662.description: Spellblade: After using an [[champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|150% '''base''' AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and creates a 300 radius frost field for 2 seconds. Enemies within the field are slowed by {{rd|25%|{{ap|25*0.5}}%}} ({{fd|1.5}} second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).

6664.name: Hollow Radiance
6664.description:
Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal {{as|{{#vardefineecho:hollow_ibase|15}} {{as|(+ {{#vardefineecho:hollow_ihp|1}}% '''bonus''' health)}} magic damage|magic damage}} every second to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 325 (+ 100% '''bonus''' size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.
Desolate: Killing a {{tt|non-champion unit|Excluding wards and structures.}} causes an eruption around their death location that deals{{ft|{{as|{{ap|{{#var:hollow_ibase}}*2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:hollow_ihp}}*2}}% '''bonus''' health)}} magic damage|magic damage}}|200% of ''Immolate's'' damage}}to enemies within 350 units. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them causes a larger eruption that deals{{ft|{{as|{{ap|{{#var:hollow_ibase}}*4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:hollow_ihp}}*4}}% '''bonus''' health)}} magic damage|magic damage}}|400% of ''Immolate's'' damage}}to enemies within 500 units.

6665.name: Jak'Sho, The Protean
6665.description: Voidborn Resilience: Gain a stack for each second [[Combat status|in combat]] with enemy champions, stacking up to 5 times. At '''maximum''' stacks, increase your {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}} by 30% until the end of combat.

6667.name: Radiant Virtue
6667.description:
350 Health
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste


  • Guiding Light: Upon casting your Ultimate you Transcend, increasing your Max Health by 12.5% for 9s. While Transcended you and allies within 1200 range of you heal for 10% of your max Health over the duration (90 (0s)).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 75 Health.

6671.name: Galeforce
6671.description:
50 Attack Damage
15% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed



Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage.

Maximum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 25%.
Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.

Active - Cloudburst: Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination. Deals physical damage, increased against low Health targets.

6672.name: Kraken Slayer
6672.description: Bring It Down: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal {{as|{{rd|150 to 200 for 11|150*0.8 to 200*0.8 for 11|levels=1;9 to 18|pp=true}} '''bonus''' physical damage|physical damage}} on-hit, increased by {{pp|0 to 75 by 5|0 to 100|key=%|color=health|type=target's '''missing''' health|key1=%}}, for up to {{as|{{rd|150*1.75 to 200*1.75 for 11|150*0.8*1.75 to 200*0.8*1.75 for 11|levels=1;9 to 18|pp=true}} '''bonus''' physical damage|physical damage}}.

6673.name: Immortal Shieldbow
6673.description: Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below {{as|30% of your '''maximum''' health}}, you first gain a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{rd|400 to 700 for 11|400*0.8 to 700*0.8 for 11|levels=1;9 to 18|pp=true}} damage for 3 seconds.

6675.name: Navori Flickerblade
6675.description: Transcendence: Basic attacks [[on-attack]] reduce the '''remaining''' cooldowns of your basic abilities by 15%.

6676.name: The Collector
6676.description:
Death: If you deal {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} damage that would leave a champion below {{as|5% of their '''maximum''' health}}, {{tip|execute}} them.
Taxes: Killing a champion grants you an additional {{g|25}}.

6677.name: Rageknife
6677.description:
25% Attack Speed


  • Wrath: Attacks apply 20 magic damage On-Hit.
  • Seething Strike: Basic attacks grant 5% Attack Speed, stacking up to 3 times for a maximum of Attack Speed.

6691.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
6691.description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
15 Ability Haste


  • Nightstalker: Your Abilities deal up to an additional 16% damage based on the target's missing health. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, you become Untargetable from non-structures for 1.5 seconds (30 (0s)) until your next action.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste and 5 Move Speed.

6692.name: Eclipse
6692.description: Ever Rising Moon: Damaging [[basic attack]]s, [[champion ability|abilities]], [[Named item effect|item effects]], and [[summoner spell]]s, as well as the application of {{tip|crowd control}} and [[damage over time]] effects, generate [[stack]]s against enemy champions, up to one per attack or cast per champion. Applying 2 stacks to a champion within a 2 second period deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to them equal to {{as|{{rd|6%|4%}} of target's '''maximum''' health}} and grants you a {{tip|shield}} for {{rd|160|80}} {{as|(+ {{rd|40%|20%}} '''bonus''' AD)}} for 2 seconds.

6693.name: Prowler's Claw
6693.description:
55 Attack Damage
22 Lethality
15 Ability Haste


  • Ambush Predator: After entering a bush your next damaging Attack or Ability on enemy champions deals 10% of their current health over 4 seconds, revealing them and reducing their vision radius for the duration. (5 (0s)).

6694.name: Serylda's Grudge
6694.description: Bitter Cold: Dealing [[ability damage]] to an enemy that is at or below {{as|50% of their '''maximum''' health}} {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 30% for 1 second.

6695.name: Serpent's Fang
6695.description: Shield Reaver: Dealing damage to an enemy champion inflicts them with venom for 3 seconds, reducing any {{tip|shield|shields}} they gain within the duration by {{rd|50%|35%}}, and if the target was not already afflicted by the venom, reducing all of their active shields by the same amount.

6696.name: Axiom Arc
6696.description: Flux: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them refunds 15% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.15}}% per 1 Lethality)}} of your ultimate ability's '''total''' cooldown.

6697.name: Hubris
6697.description: Eminence: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them generates a permanent stack and grants you {{as|15|ad}} (+ 2 per stack) {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} for 90 seconds.

6698.name: Profane Hydra
6698.description:
Cleave: Damaging basic attacks deal {{as|{{rd|40% AD|20% AD}}|ad}} {{as|physical damage}} to other enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 350 radius centered around the target.
Heretical Cleave: Deal {{as|80% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius.

6699.name: Voltaic Cyclosword
6699.description:
